document_data.mainbody:
Tuarathal was a shalarin cleric of Oghma in Myth Nantar.
Born into the shalarins Seeker Caste, Tuarathal followed the call of Oghma and joined the Faiths Caste.
Around 1349 DR, Tuarathal, with the unborn KaioaTara still inside her, led her husband Poioanam to penetrate the Great Barrier after fleeing a group of merrow that had killed all his companions. Qos accepted Poioanam and his wife and permitted them to settle in the city.
